Reviews.Title: “A charming old Hotel near the Underground and Kurfurstendamm”

Reviews.Content: stayed wife 5 days double bedroom generous size money ceilings table chairs provided bed comfortable bathroom shower reasonable size buffet breakfast adequate selection available easily fill yourself day ahead breakfast light airy windows computer connected internet provided guests near reception found selection shops near hotel visited greek restaurant nearby value short walk underground main shopping street kurfurstendamm

Reviews.Content: romantic weekend break berlin functional hotel offer bedroom en suite buffet continental breakfast hotel 10 minute stroll charlottenburg station sbahn overground 5 minutes adenauerplatz ubahn underground sbahn quicker convenient despite offering 24 hour service experienced reluctance reception desk check 630 required travel specific individual shower holder shower necessitating held shower despite reporting reception fixed screwdriver tighten screw potentially replacement concept lost team reception short walk history berlin worth visit sightseeing bus leaves kurfürstendamm warned queues bus ones boat trip badly managed short tempered bloke suggest separate boat trip sightseeing tour key sights worth visit reichstag note book appointment advance photo id tight security check airports berlin game olympic stadium impressive tour stadium 6pm €8 infrastructure getting tofrom games excellent

Reviews.Content: shocked hotel deserve star built century lifts bad smell inside staff helpful reservation 2 superior doublebed triple twinbed reservation told 2 real doublebed occupied precise single beds brought mattresses remain 8 cm apart hotel metro 10 min walking bus 5 min close center situated near highclass shopping street breakfast generous milk coffee juice sausages ham cheese bread honey eggs yogurt spacious mattress bad overall impression bad

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location, perfect for its money”

Reviews.Content: hotel close main streets berlin kudamm kurfürstendamm takes minutes bus stops couple bus stops zoo central station lot cafes restaurants nearby hotel excellent location perfect furniture standard oppressive wifi internet ancient pcs reception check transport schedule hotel choice tourists prefer explore city attractions hotel choose hotel stay berlin

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location, very friendly and a real bargain.”
Reviews.Author: Mammy12
Reviews.Content: visited hotel twice ago week occassions disappointed clean staff friendly youll hotel incredibly value money top fantastic location getting youre proximity charlottenburg railways station airport express airport pick posts kids stayed night unlike reviewer didnt hear peep behaved person wrote review tad petty paid stay nights basic hotel providing base explore wonderful city stay lap luxury suggest stump extra 200 quid night

Reviews.Content: hotel entrance reception lifts shabby dirty lovely clean bright lucky balcony location bus airport stops five minutes arrival coincided day owners staff didnt coming utmost polite friendly meals beer recommend restaurant street five minute walk
